comments:
In the middle of step A3.7 of PDE test I have opened a plugin class to look at 
its source, I have closed it, and continued with step A3.7 by switchin PDE 
editor from source page to overview page.

The dialog opened saying "Error has occured when activating this view".

Then I have chose to close Eclipse (to get logs flushed), answered yes to 
question about saving the file in the PDE editor.  Several more error dialogs 
displayed, that I acknowledged.
